attributes.action: Remove Spare Homes Subsidy From MP's
attributes.additional_details:
We the people wish to end the spare homes subsidy for MP's, as they have ended a "spare room subsidy" on the poorest people.

All MP's are to either sell their second homes in London, and return money to the treasury.

Any overnight business in London that requires an overnight stay will be allowed a reasonable amount in expenses, under £100 per night.
